content:
The most recent version of the FHIR Validator uploaded appears to be 4.2.6-SNAPSHOT posted on March 5 by @Grahame Grieve , but a version 4.3.1-SNAPSHOT was posted on Feb 16 by @James Agnew . I'm guessing this is just a miscommunication, but wanted to confirm.

Assuming 4.2.6-SNAPSHOT is the one I should use and that includes the primitive type list fix mentioned in this other thread.

Looking at the published versions here: https://oss.sonatype.org/#nexus-search;gav~ca.uhn.hapi.fhir~org.hl7.fhir.validation~~~~kw,versionexpand
4.2.6 is the correct version. see https://fhir.github.io/latest-ig-publisher/. I'm not sure what happened with 4.3.1
